Yemen's Houthis hold funeral for 17 militants killed in US-UK air strikesYemen's Houthi militia held a funeral on Saturday for at least 17 militants killed during joint U.S.-British airstrikes targeting the Iran-backed militants, the Houthi-run Saba news agency said. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 15:04:47 GMT MSDUWL6OWRJAHDZLEAD6R4N6U6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/yemen-houthis-hold-funeral-17-militants-killed-us-uk-air-strikes-2024-02-10/Reuters世界
Cuba charges 30 over massive chicken heistCuba has charged 30 people for stealing 133 tonnes of chicken and selling them on the street in a rare major heist at a time of food shortages in the communist-run nation. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 14:07:03 GMT 7TYVWBDHWRROTEMHNN5AC7A2CA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuba-charges-over-30-massive-chicken-heist-2024-02-10/Reuters世界美洲
Gaza death toll climbs 28,064 Palestinians killed, 67,611 injured since Oct. 7, health ministry saysAt least 28,064 Palestinians have been killed and 67,611 others injured in Israeli strikes on Gaza since Oct. 7, the health ministry in Gaza said in a statement on Saturday. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 12:49:04 GMT BCUNRSUQX5PNLH6LP462REZ6SA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-death-toll-climbs-28064-palestinians-killed-67611-injured-since-oct-7-gaza-2024-02-10/Reuters世界中东地区
Palestinian figure close to Hamas survives Israeli strike in Lebanon, three others killed, sources sayAn Israeli strike about 60 km inside Lebanon's southern border on Saturday targeted a Palestinian figure close to Hamas but he survived, four security sources said. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 12:47:07 GMT XFNXLJ7DIBPG5MVG4SGQWKJQJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-figure-close-hamas-survives-israeli-strikes-lebanon- Three-others-2024-02-10/Reuters世界中东地区
Russia says it foiled Ukrainian drone attack on civilian cargo ships in Black SeaRussia said on Saturday it had repelled an attempted Ukrainian drone attack on Russian "civilian transport ships" on Friday evening in the southwestern part of the Black Sea, a key artery for grain and oil exports from both countries. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 12:26:24 GMT G77Q5YKZFNOYVFOAPCKSUDJJJU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-foiled-ukrainian-drone-attack-civilian-cargo-ships-black-sea-2024-02-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia's military drone production ramping up, says defence ministerRussian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu said in footage published by his ministry on Saturday that the country's production of military drones had ramped up in the past year, though certain technical issues still needed tackling. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 10:45:51 GMT UGJTZPMTUVKILNALC6IZPOCCYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-military-drone-product-ramping-up-says-defense-minister-2024-02-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Pakistan ex-PM Imran Khan aide says party aims to form governmentA senior aide to Pakistan's jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan said on Saturday their party would try to form a government as it had won the most seats in Thursday's general election. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 10:11:58 GMT ROOQRE4SVRJPNLUGSJT32ZACCM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-ex-pm-imran-khan-aide-says-party-aims-form-government-2024-02-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Student killed in Senegal at Friday's vote-delay protests, ministry saysA student was killed in the Senegalese city of Saint-Louis amid Friday's violent protests against the postponement of the presidential election, the interior ministry said on Saturday. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 09:01:40 GMT FQW7NQPKVFJ7NMHQ4GQAWMCWDM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/student-killed-senegal-friday-vote-delay-protests-ministry-2024-02-10/Reuters世界非洲
US special envoy on North Korea to visit Tokyo, SeoulThe U.S. special envoy on North Korean human rights issues, Julie Turner, will travel to Tokyo and Seoul from Monday, the State Department said. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 07:36:55 GMT KYN2U3TDROOM6DOM6334E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-special-envoy-north-korea-visits-tokyo-seoul-2024-02-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Pakistan election: Imran Khan's party wants to form government, threatens protestsKhan and his main rival Nawaz Sharif both declared victory, increasing uncertainty over who will form the next government at a time when swift policy action is needed to address militant violence and an economy in crisis. Argentina's Milei calls on two officials to resign after reform setbackArgentine President Javier Milei on Friday called for two government officials to resign, saying he needed greater commitment to his agenda after congress rejected his reform package earlier in the week.
